PHRASE.LANG: Hot-headed hard-rockin' lizard Bunsen used to front a band, until his firey ego got to be too much. Really, he just wants to be loved. [#Legal]
Le lézard à tête chaude hardrockeur Bunsen a été dans un groupe, jusqu'à ce que son égo de feu soit trop grand. Vraiment, il veut seulement être aimé. [#Legal]
Die hitzköpfige, hart rockende Echse Bunsen war einmal Frontmann einer Band, bis sein feuriges Ego allen auf die Nerven gegangen ist. In Wirklichkeit will er einfach nur geliebt werden. [#Legal]
Bunsen, la lucertola testa calda amante del rock and roll, star di una band fino a quando il suo ego si è gonfiato troppo. In realtà, vuole solo essere amata. [#Legal]
El ardiente y roquero lagarto Bunsen llegó a liderar una banda, hasta que su inflamable ego se le fue de las manos. En realidad, solo quiere que alguien lo quiera. [#Legal]
恥ずかしがりやのBunsen君は、気性が荒く見られがち…しかし、ただ愛されたいだけなのだ。[#Legal]
성급하지만 하드록을 좋아하는 도마뱀 분센은 한 때는 밴드를 이끌기도 했습니다. 그러나 그의 불같은 자존심이 도를 넘어서고 말았지요. 사실, 그는 단지 사랑 받기를 원했을 뿐인데. [#Legal]
Hot-headed hard-rockin' lizard Bunsen used to front a band, until his firey ego got to be too much. Really, he just wants to be loved. [#Legal]
玩重搖滾的文森脾氣暴躁，以前組過樂團，結果太過自大被掃地出門。他只是想要有人愛，真的。[#Legal]
玩重搖滾的文森脾氣暴躁，以前組過樂團，結果太過自大被掃地出門。他只是想要有人愛，真的。[#Legal]
Hot-headed hard-rockin' lizard Bunsen used to front a band, until his firey ego got to be too much. Really, he just wants to be loved. [#Legal]
